reviewText: My now 5-yr.-old daughter received this as a gift when she was 3, and at the time showed no interest in it whatsoever.  But I kept popping it in from time to time - the songs are catchy, unusual, and the visuals are neat - and around age 4 1/2, she suddenly loved it!  The song style is different from say, Joe Scruggs (whom we also enjoy), maybe a little more "sophisticated" (That is, the difference in sophistication between a 3 and 5 year old!) We watch this one often and plan to pick up another Eddie Coker video soon...
